Rescue.name: Rescue
summary: For a current emergency or business critical incident ocurring now,
response times within 1 hour, 4 hours etc
information: We commence our service on completion of your purchase.
You identify to us the nature of your technical difficulty,
the circumstances leading up to it, and your desired outcome.
Our response time is measured from our receipt of this information.
We endeavour to resolve your difficulty and to achieve your desired outcome
within the key features and schedule of your purchased product.
You must provide us access to your system for the duration of our involvement.
For the fastest possible response and resolution, our initial response is
via remote access, phone and messaging.
Subsequently we will travel to your site to continue the service,
if it is necessary and if there is sufficient time remaining.
Definition: Minutes, Hours, Days = within business hours, 9-5 Mon-Fri exc public holidays

HelpDesk.name: Help desk
summary: Ongoing access to our help desk for day to day IT difficulties;
with escalation to level 2 & 3 IT experts
information: We commence our service on completion of your purchase.
You identify to our help desk the nature of your technical difficulty,
the circumstances leading up to it, and your desired outcome.
We endeavour to resolve your difficulty and to achieve your desired outcome
within the key features and schedule of your purchased product.
You must provide us access to your system for the duration of our involvement.
For the fastest possible response and resolution, our initial response is
via remote access, phone and messaging.
Subsequently we may travel to your site to continue the service.
This is a reactive service, not proactive; see also proactive services.
This service is not appropriate for emergencies and other time critical responses;
see our emergency response services
Definitions: Minutes, Hours, Days = within business hours, 9-5 Mon-Fri exc public holidays

Proactive.name: Proactive
summary: Monitoring, maintenance and help desk. Detect and resolve technical issues
before they impact the business, response time guarantees,
manage system updates/patches, security, anti-malware, backups,

Cloud.name: Cloud
summary: Business email, productivity suites, and user accounts
from Microsoft (Office 365 etc) and Google (G Suite),
with options for telanova's setup, migration and support

Projects.name: Projects
summary: A specific project for your organisation; upgrading your system,
introducing a line of business application, moving to the cloud,
new premises, expanding, downsizing, compliance etc.
Project management, advice, and/or strategic consultancy

TimeBankSubscription.name: Time Bank Subscription
features: For smaller organisations with basic IT
Subscribe in units of 30 minutes per month
Draw down as few minutes as needed for each call
Helpdesk access via phone / email / web
Minutes rollover for 12 months from purchase

TimeBank.name: Time Bank
features: For smaller organisations with basic IT
Purchase in blocks of 4 hrs (240 mins)
Draw down as few minutes as needed for each call
Helpdesk access via phone / email / web

ProactiveCore.name: Proactive core
features: Proactively detect and resolve technical issues to prevent outage

ProactiveEnterprise.name: Proactive enterprise
features: Proactively detect and resolve technical issues to prevent outage

features: Web based docs, spreadsheets and presentations
Service and standard support from google.com

GSuiteBusiness.name: G Suite Business
features: Web based docs, spreadsheets and presentations
e-Discovery, audit, archive and retention policies
Service and standard support from google.com

GSuiteEnterprise.name: G Suite Enterprise
features: Web based docs, spreadsheets and presentations
e-Discovery, audit, archive and retention policies
Service and standard support from google.com

CloudSetup.name: Cloud Setup
features: Setup your domain's DNS for cloud
Set up email accounts and aliases

Microsoft Access and Publisher for Windows
File storage and sharing via OneDrive
Web and mobile versions of Office apps

features: Microsoft Outlook, Word, Excel, Powerpoint for Windows & Mac
Microsoft Access and Publisher for Windows
File storage and sharing via OneDrive

features: A specific project for your organisation, eg:
Introducing a new line of business application,
